title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
question:
Merge two sorted linked lists and return it as a new list. The new list should be made by splicing together the nodes of the first two lists.

Example:
Input: 1->2->4, 1->3->4
Output: 1->1->2->3->4->4
code: /** * Definition for singly-linked list. * public class ListNode { *     public int val; *     public ListNode next; *     public ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */public class Solution {    public ListNode MergeTwoLists(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {            }}
